text: ::Mitrovica can also refer to Pristina city in the north of Kosovo South of Mitrovica is a town in North Kosovo Over 96,250 people live in Kosovska Mitrovica, The town used to be called Titova Mitrovica. Originally it was named after Saint Dimitrije. There is the University of Pristina in Kosovska Mitrovica. == Other websites == * Municipality of Mitrovica The official website of Municipality of South Mitrovica * University of Pristina website * Jazz & Blues Festival North City Category:Towns in Serbia Category:Settlements in Kosovo
title: Kosovska Mitrovica
